channel.title: DMCA Violation?
channel.description: It wouldn't be considered a DMCA Violation if I have SCAR linked to Dylock's page now would it? I'm getting a bunch of shit for people telling me it is.

item.title: DMCA Violation?
item.dc:creator: @owningme1 owningme1
item.description:
@owningme1 wrote:

xxlegitxx:

Wtf is ‘SCAR linked to Dylock’s page’?

Yeah what he said, what is it? lol

Read full topic

item.title: DMCA Violation?
item.dc:creator: @xxlegitxx xxlegitxx
item.description:
@xxlegitxx wrote:

I thought he modded scar to display dylock’s page in the updates box. And yea jme, maybe you’re just more attuned to noob-talk. XD. I don’t see what is wrong with linking to someone’s webpage…I don’t see MS suing me for including a link to download IE… unless he meant direct linking, which is alright unless he’s hotlinking, which you really can’t for a .exe.

Read full topic

item.title: DMCA Violation?
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

[quote=“cruel, post:9, topic:54770”][quote author=jme_009 link=topic=77401.msg865454#msg865454 date=1170662060]

Wtf is ‘SCAR linked to Dylock’s page’?

Quite honestly I find that somewhat sad considering you are not a new member, at all. [/quote]
It doesn’t make any sense… linking SCAR to dylock’s site… :/[/quote]
Well it may be a poor choice of wording, but it still shouldn’t take much thought to figure it out…

Maybe it’s just me though

Read full topic

item.title: DMCA Violation?
item.dc:creator: @Mopman Mopman
item.description:
@Mopman wrote:

Considering the SCAR copyright owner will never ever see your site, it’s not like you have to worry anyway.

EDIT: And that would come under bog standard Copyright law, not DMCA.

Read full topic

item.title: DMCA Violation?
item.dc:creator: @cruel cruel
item.description:
@cruel wrote:

[quote=“jme_009, post:3, topic:54770”][quote author=xxlegitxx link=topic=77401.msg859762#msg859762 date=1170557746]
Wtf is ‘SCAR linked to Dylock’s page’?
[/quote]
Quite honestly I find that somewhat sad considering you are not a new member, at all.[/quote]
It doesn’t make any sense… linking SCAR to dylock’s site…

Read full topic

item.title: DMCA Violation?
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

[quote=“usernamelol, post:7, topic:54770”][quote author=jme_009 link=topic=77401.msg865454#msg865454 date=1170662060]

Wtf is ‘SCAR linked to Dylock’s page’?

Quite honestly I find that somewhat sad considering you are not a new member, at all.

Anyways no your not violating any rules if you are linking to dylocks site, they are on completely different servers. And, no idea what DMCA is, but SCAR is 100% legal to use just so you know.
[/quote]
Basically having something on your website without the owners permission.[/quote]
If your linking to dylocks page to download scar then it’s fine. Hosting it on your server might not be so fine, but it’s still something I wouldn’t worry about since a million other people do it.[br][size=1]Posted on: February 04, 2007, 11:13:09 PM[/size][hr]Or even better, you could ask Dylock about your question.

Read full topic
